name: The Slickest Beans
description:
You are the slickest bean! Fallen into a seemingly endless blender, you are to be ground to a fine dust with the remaining coffee beans. But then your will to live awakens!

Reach the top and collect as many bean points as possible!

Try different combos to earn bean points!

A - Left

D -Right

W - Jump

Space - Dash

Made for Trijam #120 by Piepscho & Möhrenherz

Most features are still missing, but will be added after the jam! Well, all features actually + full of bugs. Sorry for that :D Also try not to dash
